item.title: Call 678-383-1690 to discuss your situation.
item.description:
Call  678-383-1690 to discuss your situation.

My name is Ed Napier, and I am a licensed Attorney in Georgia. My firm is located in Douglasville, Georgia.  I offer customized legal services for individuals, families, and small businesses.  My goal is to provide you with the experience you need and the personal service you want.

item.title: Largest Member Only Supported Statewide Criminal Defense Association in the United States

item.title: Celebrate Douglas County Georgia
item.description:
Celebrate Douglas County Georgia

Douglas County, Georgia, is Atlanta's West, Atlanta's Best - a 200-square-mile jurisdiction adjacent to the Chattahoochee River that provides suburban living at its best, including great transportation with direct access to Atlanta's Hartsfield International Airport, affordable housing, local clean industry and retail centers, reliable water system, and friendly people.

item.title: Douglasville Criminal Defense Attorney Ed Napier
item.description:
Douglasville Criminal Defense Attorney Ed Napier

Douglasville Attorney Ed Napier provides customized legal services for individuals, families, and small businesses. The experience you need. The personal service you want. Attorney Ed Napier In your corner when you need him.
